dcterms:creator: Dominik Schlechtweg
Barbara McGillivray
Simon Hengchen
Haim Dubossarsky
Nina Tahmasebi
dcterms:description: The SEMEVAL-CCOHA corpus is used to test different word embeddings and evaluate their performance in detecting semantic change.
dcterms:title: SEMEVAL-CCOHA (SemEval Clean Corpus of Historical American English)

dcterms:description: RODICA is a collection of Romanian language news articles collected from various historical regions of Romania, spanning from the 19th century to the early 21st century.
dcterms:title: RODICA (ROmanian DIachonic Corpus with Annotations)

dcterms:creator: Anna A. Zalizniak
Maria Bulakh
Dmitrij Ganenkov
Ilya Gruntov
Timur Maisak
Maxim Russo
dcterms:description: The Catalogue of Semantic Shifts serves as a database for lexical semantic typology, providing a list of words that have changed their meanings.
dcterms:title: The Catalogue of Semantic Shifts

dcterms:creator: Petra Novotná
Václav Blažek
dcterms:description: The Swadesh dataset is used to create a list of words that tend to change their meanings slowly, primarily used for assessing language splits.
dcterms:title: Swadesh
